content.title: Surgery Payment Facilities for Australians - Cosmetic Surgery Thailand
h2: A minimum instalment amount is payable. All figures quoted by Mac Credit are for guidance only and will be determined upon each applicant’s criteria during the application process. The above figures are based on a 7 year loan period, shorter loan periods and early loans payouts are available. ANZ Bank is the lender. Interest rates will vary at the time of finance application. Applying for personal loans with your bank will also be determined by the applicants criteria, interest rates may vary accordingly.
paragraphs: Beauty MED is working with MacCredit for a plastic surgery payment plan to finance your breast augmentation surgery.
In short, you apply, and if you get accepted you will receive the money and pay it back as a loan.
The main things MacCredit will look:
1. You must be able to show a proof of income (example salary slips) – Center Link income will also be considered2. You need to have a good credit history3. Australia only
Single Parent / Centrelink income as primary income, also applicants who has worked at a new place of work for less than 1 month may be accepted.
If you are a housewife or have no current job and do not meet criteria 1, then the husband/boyfriend or relative can be the person holding the debt (borrowing the money).

✔ Plans up to $70,000 with terms up to 7 years✔ Finance all or part of your procedure✔ No deposit required and no upfront fees✔ Fast efficient approvals, simply apply online✔ Flexible on repayment amounts (minimum required)✔ Flexible repayment amounts*

Sometimes you may not have the initial funds available when you want to have your cosmetic surgery or medical treatment. Thousands of Australians have opted for Mac Credit, a Cosmetic and Medical Finance Company, to help them have their treatment /surgery now.

Click hereto complete the Mac Credit application online. For answers to any questions you have, simply call Mac Credit on their toll free number 1300 884 355 and inform them you are considering booking with Beauty Med Thailand to ensure a dedicated account manager will take care of your needs.
Dr. Kamol Hospital BangkokNaravee Clinic BangkokPAI (Dr. Preecha) BangkokPIAC Hospital PhuketSan Paulo Hospital Hua HinYanhee Hospital BangkokBangpakok 9 Hospital Bangkok

content.body_text: Home Procedures FACE SURGERY Alarplasty Cheek Reduction Chin Augmentation Chin Shaving Forehead Lift Full Face Lift Mini FaceLift Nose Implants Tip Rhinoplasty Nose Surgery Upper Eyelid Surgery Lower Eyelid Surgery BREAST SURGERY Breast Implants Breast Lift Breast Reduction BODY SURGERY Buttock Lift Buttocks Implants Liposuction Lipoplasty Tummy Tuck Vaser Hi Def Vaser Liposelection OTHER SURGERY Male to Female Female to Male Hair Transplants Hospitals Get Surgeon Feedback Mac Credit Payment Plan Beauty MED is working with MacCredit for a plastic surgery payment plan to finance your breast augmentation surgery. In short, you apply, and if you get accepted you will receive the money and pay it back as a loan. The main things MacCredit will look: 1. You must be able to show a proof of income (example salary slips) – Center Link income will also be considered 2. You need to have a good credit history 3. Australia only Single Parent / Centrelink income as primary income, also applicants who has worked at a new place of work for less than 1 month may be accepted. If you are a housewife or have no current job and do not meet criteria 1, then the husband/boyfriend or relative can be the person holding the debt (borrowing the money). Mac Credit Benefits ✔ Plans up to $70,000 with terms up to 7 years ✔ Finance all or part of your procedure ✔ No deposit required and no upfront fees ✔ Fast efficient approvals, simply apply online ✔ Flexible on repayment amounts (minimum required) ✔ Flexible repayment amounts* Sometimes you may not have the initial funds available when you want to have your cosmetic surgery or medical treatment. Thousands of Australians have opted for Mac Credit, a Cosmetic and Medical Finance Company, to help them have their treatment /surgery now. Mac Credit Payment Option Examples Price (AUD) Mac Credit Payment Plans $3,000 $25/week $4,000 $25/week $5,000 $25/week $6,000 $30/week $7,000 $35/week $8,000 $40/week $9,000 $45/week $10,000 $50/week $15,000 $73/week $20,000 $98/week How to apply Click here to complete the Mac Credit application online. For answers to any questions you have, simply call Mac Credit on their toll free number 1300 884 355 and inform them you are considering booking with Beauty Med Thailand to ensure a dedicated account manager will take care of your needs. A minimum instalment amount is payable. All figures quoted by Mac Credit are for guidance only and will be determined upon each applicant’s criteria during the application process. The above figures are based on a 7 year loan period, shorter loan periods and early loans payouts are available. ANZ Bank is the lender. Interest rates will vary at the time of finance application. Applying for personal loans with your bank will also be determined by the applicants criteria, interest rates may vary accordingly.
